name: Use 6 cards in one turn without tossing
Don't use Umi
Beat Villager 1 in a Free Duel
3D battle with Psychic Kappa
Destroy Labyrinth Wall with Breath of Light
Beat Keith in a Free Duel
Beat every Mage without changing the field type
Trapless A-Tec
Fuse 7 Colored Fish

Buy a card that can't be obtained as a drop
Have a Hand with no Monsters
Beat Rex with a deck with monsters with no more than 500 original ATK
Have the AI activate type-specific removal (Dragon Capture Jar, etc)
Win against a low mage with them only playing their respective field spell
Win a duel with a card who's name ends with 'man'
500 or more total cards in chest
Don't win against Duel Master K
Have three copies of the same card in your hand
Don't leave the shrine after beating Meadow Mage
Perform a whole hand Fusion
Win a duel after the field has been every field type
Destroy 5 spells and/or traps at the same time with a single effect card
